div.p: Specifies the state change of a target Act, such as a document or an entry, from its previous state as a predecessor Act.
For example, if the target Act is the result of a predecessor Act being "obsoleted" and replaced with the target Act, the source ProvenanceEventCurrentState Act code would be "obsoleted".

valueString.value: Create the combined value set which includes the value sets containikng codes from the two code systms ActStatus and DocumentCompletreion.

description.value: Specifies the state change of a target Act, such as a document or an entry, from its previous state as a predecessor Act. For example, if the target Act is the result of a predecessor Act being "obsoleted" and replaced with the target Act, the source ProvenanceEventCurrentState Act code would be "obsoleted".
